group.title: Introduction to time-stamp policies and general requirements

part.name: statement
part.p: A TSA may define its own policy which enhances a policy defined in the present document.

part.name: statement
part.p: If the TSA defines its own policy it shall incorporate or further constrain the requirements identified in the present document.

part.name: statement
part.p: If an accuracy of better than 1 second is provided by the TSA then the accuracy shall be indicated in the TSA's disclosure part and in each time-stamp issued to an accuracy of better than 1 second.

control.title: Inclusion of Time-Stamp Policy Identifier in TSA Disclosure part

part.name: statement
part.p: A TSA shall include the identifier for the time-stamp policy being supported in the TSA disclosure part made available to subscribers and relying parties to indicate its claim of conformance.

control.title: Indication of Supported ETSI Time-Stamping Identifier in TSA Policy and Disclosure part

part.name: statement
part.p: If the TSA uses its own identifier for the time-stamp policy, the TSA shall indicate in its policy document and in its TSA disclosure part, the ETSI time-stamping identifier (i.e. BSTP) being supported.

control.title: Time-Stamping Policy for Public and Closed Community Services

part.name: statement
part.p: This policy may be used for public time-stamping services or time-stamping services used within a closed community.
